text: Niscaya tara ksatigrasta, yara allahara saksatke mithya mane kareche. Emanaki, yakhana kiyamata tadera kache akasmat ese yabe, tara balabeh haya aphasosa, era byapare amara kata'i na krati karechi. Tara sbiya bojha sbiya prsthe bahana karabe. Sune rakha, tara ye bojha bahana karabe, ta nikrstatara bojha.
